title: Fantasy Time Machine + Target Breakdowns, Blind Spots - Fantasy Football Podcast for 9/2
description:
One week until NFL Kickoff! The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode to get you ready for the 2021 season. On today’s fantasy football podcast, Andy, Mike, and Jason step into the Fantasy Time Machine! Who can be this year’s version of 2020 David Montgomery, or Stefon Diggs? Plus, a new edition of “Never Not Working!” Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for September 2nd, 2021.
  
 Dominate your fantasy football draft with the 2021 Ultimate Draft Kit -- get the Draft Analyzer with the UDK+
  
 (05:05) - Never Not Working - WR Targets
 (13:15) - NFL News
 (22:00) - Fantasy Time Machine
 (22:35) - Finding 2021’s David Montgomery
 (29:25) - Finding 2021’s Stefon Diggs
 (36:05) - Finding 2021’s Logan Thomas
 (46:45) - Finding 2021’s Kirk Cousins
  
 Connect with the show:
  Subscribe on YouTube
 Visit us on the Web
 Support the Show
 Follow on Twitter
 Follow on Instagram
  
 Join THE largest fantasy football league! Megalabowl.com
